def_cn: （与副词连用构成形容词）表示“具有…能力（做）的”
def_en: -placed combines with adverbs to form adjectives which describe how well or badly someone is able to do a particular task.

def_cn: （与副词连用构成形容词）表示“位置…的”
def_en: -placed combines with adverbs to form adjectives which indicate how good or bad the position of a building or area is considered to be.
